name: docker_web_app
description: Integration between ['git-repository', 'azure app services' , 'docker images' , 'CI/CD' automation ]

container_as_service: Updates can be pushed to any part of a distributed application
Scaling your application is a matter of spinning up new executables, not running heavy VM hosts
Integrate to CI/CD and other automation systems

author: Jalal Hejazi <jalal.hejazi@iCloud.com> Cloud Architect

scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker && docker push jalalhejazi/node-web-app:latest
scripts.git:deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'docker_web_app' && npm version patch  && git push origin master --follow-tags && npm repo .
